item.title: Everyday verbs 3
item.description: Have Take Break smash verb [transitive] to break something with a lot of force A policeman smashed his camera.

item.title: 8 Everyday verbs 2
item.description: Get is a very common verb in English, but it is not always appropriate for talking about changes.
